title: Chest stealing my Icon
body:
Honestly I've never had a real problem with League before so I wasn't sure where to post this: 
I saw I had some key fragments so I opened up some boxes, there was an option to open 2 at once so that's just what I did. 
It _said_ I got a Rek'Sai skin, some orange essence, and a Diana Icon. This was all well and good until I saw that the Icon was missing (and maybe the essence but it's hard to tell becuase I can't recall the previous values) 
I have shut and re opened the client, turned my PC off and on, ect. and the icon isn't there. 
To be quite frank I don't realy care for or need icons, but it would just be nice to know that I didn't get absolutely nothing out of that box. 

Thanks, Snowpiggy

replies.body:
Hey summoner, 

Have you checked that the icon wasn't already placed into your icon inventory? Icons don't need to be activated with essence, they are instantly redeemed and therefore skip sitting in your loot tab.

Yeah I did check yesterday, but I'll open the client up and check everything again.

Thanks for the help
